description:
Eri clumsily clips off Harima’s precious beard, but he’ll bounce back if a certain someone approves. His latest comic needs some help, but the loner doesn’t have anyone to turn to. Have you ever heard of a damsel helping a dork in distress?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Are ga Nai! / Kore mo Nai! / Dou Shiyou mo Nai!
Fehlt was? Na das! Ach was!
Sitä ei ole! / Eikä sitäkään! / Ei mitään tekemistä!
That`s Gone! / This Is Gone! / Options, Gone!
あれがない! / これもない! / どうしようもない!
